text:
@JohnCornyn Why should this be a problem? Dear leader has all but claimed it's done. He wants RNC with no masks, social distancing or any precautions. He wants rallies with the same. Go ahead, give him a handshake and a hug. Dare you Johnny boy.
#COVID19
